mapper.select: SELECT ur.user_id, ur.role_id, r.name as role_name, r.code as role_code, r.description as role_description, r.enabled as role_enabled, ur.created_time, ur.updated_time, ur.created_by, ur.updated_by FROM wf_user_role ur LEFT JOIN wf_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.enabled = 1 ORDER BY ur.created_time DESC
